description:
Purchase this DLC disables score limit on this table and unlocks Devil Riders Retro table.

Devil Riders Table

Information:
Name: Devil Riders
Theme: Stunt Motorcycles
Production year: 1984
MPU: Generation 2
Type: Solid State (SS)

Features:
1 playfield
6 flippers
4 pop bumpers
2 slingshots
2 ramps
3-bank drop targets (2)
3-bank spot targets (2)
name: Devil Riders Table
